articles.title: Everything in place for massive Russian attack on Ukraine, France says - Reuters
articles.description: France's foreign minister said on Monday that everything was in place for Russian forces to invade quickly in Ukraine, adding that Europe was ready to impose massive sanctions if it happened.

articles.author: Yuras Karmanau and Vladimir Isachenkov
articles.title: Ukraine crisis: Kremlin signals more talks with West - CTV News
articles.description: The Kremlin signalled Monday it is ready to keep talking with the West about security grievances that led to the current Ukraine crisis, offering hope that Russia might not invade its beleaguered neighbor within days as the U.S. and Europe increasingly fear.
articles.content:

articles.title: Chaotic Mounds, Wind-Sculpted Ripples, Dust Devil Tracks: ESA Shares Unique Photo of Mars Landscape - Gadgets 360
articles.description: The European Space Agency (ESA) has released a stunning photograph of the surface of Mars, demonstrating how winds sculpt the landscape. The Hooke Crater area in the Red Planet's southern highlands is shown in this image taken from orbit by ESA and Roscosmos'…
